channel.title: Qlimax 317 join us here staff spots open!
channel.description:
qlimax 317!!!!
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/261586126/Qlimax.jar jarred client easy simple download!
https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=Bountyscape webclient to check the place out !!!
updated prayers turmoil soul spilt etc... custom items updated pvp armour torva, statius, vesta. working cc! unique home. unique gambling! freindly commuinty! staff positions! web client! corp for spirit shields stoner zone (grow your own drugs :]) dragon ornamental and spiked. amazing pvp godwars coming soon! fast growing community! 100% summoning !
this server really does have everything and more than what your asking for!
join now invite your freinds for cool items and rewards
more players more staff spots more drop parties!

item.title: Qlimax 317 join us here staff spots open!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Offering staff positions on a server isn’t a very good idea. That’s how you attract the power hungry player abusive staff members who are only in it for a crown.

As for your thread, why not add a little design? put some work into it? This thread is very basic and boring to look at. Not much to appeal the eye. Anyway, good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: Qlimax 317 join us here staff spots open!
